meanings.definition: The quality of being flashy or showy in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: Her outfit's flashiness caught everyone's attention at the party.
meanings.sent2: The flashiness of the fireworks lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The flashiness of his dance moves made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The flashiness of the car's paint job was like a rainbow on wheels.
meanings.sent5: The flashiness of the jewelry made it impossible to look away.

meanings.definition: The state or quality of being bright, colorful, or attention-grabbing.
meanings.sent1: The flashiness of the flowers in the garden was breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: The flashiness of the neon sign attracted customers to the store.
meanings.sent3: The flashiness of the clown's costume made the children giggle.
meanings.sent4: The flashiness of the sunset painted the sky in hues of orange and pink.
meanings.sent5: The flashiness of the advertisement made it impossible to miss.
